attributes.action: Not allow our school to make girls change into trousers if their skirt is rolled
attributes.additional_details: Is not ok. Especially if the trousers they are making the girls change into don’t fit them. They have made parents buy new school skirts which are around £20 each as they have to have the school logo on. And now they are going to make them buy new trousers aswell.
attributes.background: Our school has a new skirt policy and if your skirt is more than 5cm above the knee we are forced to change into trousers. And if we refuse we get put in isolation for a day. I understand the school wanting to make a change but making girls change into trousers which makes them feel uncomfortable

rejection.details:
This is a decision for your school and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking to make it illegal for schools to have compulsory logo on school uniform.
